instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2141: What is A2141? A2141 is a model number for a 16 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2019 with EMC 3347, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01700..
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR_REG: What is PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR_REG? This is battery power that flows to the system AFTER it has gone through a current sense resistor, before it goes through a fuse to become PPBUS_G3H power rail. .

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message:
Hello,
Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> not getting on.

Found <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> shorted. Removed the Fuses F7000/1. 

Diode Mode Readings (red to ground)
<SIGNAL>PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR_REG</SIGNAL> is.488
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> is .013.

Started checking SSD Coils.
L9080 is 0.351
L9580 is 0.005

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message:
Bad news if NAND chips have been damaged.
We have many threads on the forum about SSD problems on <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>.

Remove <CHIP>U9580</CHIP> and check again diode mode at <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>.
If short disappeared, check aat L9580 too.
If still low there, at least one NAND is fried.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message:
Removed <CHIP>U9580</CHIP>. <SIGNAL>PPBUS_SHORT</SIGNAL> is Gone.
But L9580 is still low.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message: Then you have to deal with SSD failure now.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message:
Have another case.

Removed <CHIP>U9580</CHIP>.

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_SHORT</SIGNAL> .
Diode Mode Reading of L9580 was 0.003. After Removal of <CHIP>U9580</CHIP> is 0.033.

<CAPACITOR>C9580</CAPACITOR> is a blank point or is it missing on my board?

Also can this be repaired?

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message:
0.033 is still too low for NAND power rail.
At least one chip is bad...

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message: Customer is willing to repair it at any cost - how can we proceed?

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message:
Search "<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> SSD repair" on YouTube.
No idea what happened, but the forum doesn't accept to post an URL since 4-5 days...

What is actual SSD size of your machine?

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2141</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> Shorted
threads.message: I have a JC P13 Programmer. Can you guide me to the right Youtube Channel ?
